scheme_name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme-Madhya Pradesh
nodal_department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
brief_description: The Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme is being operated to provide financial support to widowed women living below the poverty line.
detailed_description: Launched in the year 2009, the scheme "Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)" is a Centrally Sponsored Scheme by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Government. of Madhya Pradesh. Under this scheme, financial support is provided to the widows of the state of Sikkim. A widow whose household is below the poverty line is eligible to get the benefits of the pension scheme. The beneficiary receives a monthly pension amount consists of the Central and State governments&#39; share.
benefits: The beneficiary will get a monthly pension of ₹ 600/-.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a domicile of the state of Madhya Pradesh. The applicant should be from a Below Poverty Line (BPL) family. The application should be aged between 40 to 79 years.

steps: Step 1: The Application in the prescribed application form in the rural area of ​​his native residence-Gram Panchayat / Janpad Panchayat, Nagar Panchayat / municipal council/ municipal corporation office in an urban area with three photographs, certificate for confirmation of age, Samagra ID and BPL card Or apply online through the nearest Loksewa Kendra.
Step 02: Fill in all the mandatory fields of the application form, attach all the (self-attested) mandatory documents, and submit them to the designated receiving authority.
Step 1 :Applicants have to visit the official portal.
Step 2 : Click on the "Online Apply for Pension Scheme".
Step 3 :Select District, Local Are, and enter Samagram ID.
Step 4 : Select the online application option.
Step 5 : Fill out the application form.

documents_required: Three photos of applicant. Husband's death certificate. B.P.L. card. Certificate to confirm age.
